title: Sacred sites (A)
creator_contributor_role: Commonwealth Dept of Aboriginal Affairs, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode number 4 of Series "Rainbow serpent". Bob Maza narrates this exploration of the Australian Aborigine's relationship to his sacred sites. Several sites are visited with their guardians who explain the importance of maintaining the sites and protecting them from the tourist, mining and agricultural industries. Sites visited include, Merella Cave, W.A., Uluru, Alice Springs, Guru Guru Cave, W.A. and Milbrodale, N.S.W. There are also extensive interviews with Charles Perkins.
